16. Data Unit Class¶

16.1. Data Unit Class – sinon.data_unit¶

class sinon.api.data_unit.DataUnit(uid)[source]¶

Bases: sinon.api.unit.Unit

DataUnit class.

import_data(src, ttype='Sync')[source]¶

For a data unit which does not point to PFNs yet, create a first PFN as copy from the given src URL.

FIXME: what happens if we already have PFNs?

export_data(tgt, ttype='Sync')[source]¶

Copy any of the data_unit’s PFNs to the tgt URL.

remove_data(ttype='Sync')[source]¶

Removes the data. Implies cancel ()
